actions.committee: Committee on Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate Congressional review of newly-passed District laws.
short_title: District of Columbia Legislative Autonomy Act of 2006

summary.text: District of Columbia Legislative Autonomy Act of 2006 - Amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate congressional review of newly-passed District laws.

titles.title: District of Columbia Legislative Autonomy Act of 2006
To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate Congressional review of newly-passed District laws.
